subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Cleveland Cavaliers held host Atlanta scoreless for almost nine minutes to open the fourth quarter and scored the first 10 points of the period to break open a close game and beat the Hawks, 95-84, on Tuesday night.
snippet: The Cleveland Cavaliers held host Atlanta scoreless for almost nine minutes to open the fourth quarter and scored the first 10 points of the period to break open a close game and beat the Hawks, 95-84, on Tuesday night.
